package_specs.name: Event Tracing - Record Performance Data
package_specs.parameter_definition:
{
    "parameters": [
      {
        "separatorText": "Results available at Tanium Client\\Tools\\Event Tracing\\results",
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::SeparatorParameter",
        "label": "Separator",
        "defaultValue": ""
      },
      {
        "defaultValue": "",
        "helpString": "Enter the host name of the endpoint that you are gathering ETL data from",
        "label": "Computer Name of Endpoint",
        "maxChars": "",
        "promptText": "<hostname>",
        "validationExpressions": [
          {
            "expression": "^.+$",
            "helpString": "",
            "model": "com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression",
            "parameterType": "com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression"
          }
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter",
        "key": "$1"
      },
      {
        "label": "Duration of Trace",
        "helpString": "Please enter the amount of seconds you would like the ETL collection to run for. 120-180 is adequate for most scenarios.",
        "defaultValue": "120",
        "stepSize": "",
        "snapInterval": "",
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter",
        "key": "$2"
      },
      {
        "label": "Zip Results",
        "helpString": "Check box to compress results to a zip file",
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::CheckBoxParameter",
        "key": "$3",
        "defaultValue": true
      },
      {
        "label": "Filemode",
        "helpString": "Check box to use Filemode WPR option",
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::CheckBoxParameter",
        "key": "$4",
        "defaultValue": true
      },
      {
        "label": "Use Recommended Profile Types",
        "helpString": "Uses CPU and Minifilter profile types",
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::CheckBoxParameter",
        "key": "$5",
        "defaultValue": true
      },
      {
        "separatorText": "Profile Types",
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::SeparatorParameter",
        "label": "",
        "defaultValue": ""
      },
      {
        "label": "CPU",
        "helpString": "CPU activity",
        "values": [
          "light",
          "verbose",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$6",
        "drillDownAutoPopulate": false,
        "defaultValue": "verbose"
      },
      {
        "label": "Minifilter",
        "helpString": "Minifilter I/O Activity",
        "values": [
          "light",
          "verbose",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$7",
        "defaultValue": "verbose"
      },
      {
        "label": "DiskIO",
        "helpString": "Disk I/O activity",
        "values": [
          "light",
          "verbose",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$8",
        "defaultValue": "verbose"
      },
      {
        "label": "FileIO",
        "helpString": "File I/O activity",
        "values": [
          "light",
          "verbose",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$9",
        "defaultValue": "verbose"
      },
      {
        "label": "Handle",
        "helpString": "Handle usage",
        "values": [
          "light",
          "verbose",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$10",
        "defaultValue": "verbose"
      },
      {
        "label": "Registry",
        "helpString": "Registry I/O activity",
        "values": [
          "light",
          "verbose",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$11",
        "defaultValue": "verbose"
      },
      {
        "label": "Network",
        "helpString": "Networking I/O activity",
        "values": [
          "light",
          "verbose",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$12",
        "defaultValue": "verbose"
      },
      {
        "label": "VirtualAllocation",
        "helpString": "VirtualAllocation usage",
        "values": [
          "light",
          "verbose",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$13",
        "defaultValue": "verbose"
      },
      {
        "label": "WMI",
        "helpString": "Custom WMI Activity Profile",
        "values": [
          "enabled",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$14",
        "defaultValue": ""
      },
      {
        "label": "Power",
        "helpString": "Power metrics",
        "values": [
          "light",
          "verbose",
          "disabled"
        ],
        "parameterType": "com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter",
        "key": "$15",
        "defaultValue": "verbose"
      }
    ]
  }
